Reviews.Title: Great purchase!!!
Reviews.Author: Tim Carter
Reviews.Content: I was looking for am easy to use entry level package. This is it for sure!! The accessories aren't top notch, but the quality of the photos is GREAT!!!

Reviews.Title: Look no further
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Tindol
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the Nikon D3100 camera. All of the pictures have turned out great and at high quality. The battery has been better then expected, 300+ pics have been taken and it is just now at half battery life. I expected the extra stuff in the package to be cheap like in other packages, but it was not. The bag seems like it will last and has all the pockets for everything I will need to carry. I looked around for a while and this seemed to be the best deal for the price and what I was looking for. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.

ProductInfo.Features:
18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G ED II lens
55-200mm f/4-5.6G ED lens
14.2 MP CMOS sensor
Full 1080p HD Cinematic Video with full-time autofocus and sound
Built-in pop-up flash and In-Camera Editing
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3100 14.2MP Digital SLR Double-Zoom Lens Kit with 18-55mm and 55-200mm DX Zoom Lenses Bundle with 32GB SD Card + Multi-Card Reader + Tiffen 52mm UV Protection Filter + Tiffen 52mm Circular Polarizing Lens + SLR Camera Gadget Bag + Accessory Kit
